Question1.question: How do I report a bug?
Question1.answer: By mail to the contact, you may also receive a reward!

Question2.question: Is there in-app purchase?
Question2.answer: Yes there will be exclusive free and purchasable 'Navi' (small original or collab' character that guide you, even with japanese voice actor) available soon

Question3.question: Is my data private?
Question3.answer: If you chose to watch publicity to get Stroll coins, you can enable the use of your personal data for more accurate publicity. Otherwise your data is strictly private
